alert.note: Alert for Inland Southern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Okeechobee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 11 at 5:10AM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: At 500 AM, surface observations and satellite imagery indicated dense fog forming from the Treasure Coast and Okeechobee regions northward to southern Brevard County. Fog was reducing visibility to less than one mile, with locally dense fog reducing visibility to less than one-half mile at times. If dense fog becomes more widespread, a Dense Fog Advisory may be needed. Conditions will improve as fog dissipates by 8 or 9 AM. Motorists driving this morning in these locations should prepare to encounter rapidly decreasing visibility in fog. When driving in dense fog, reduce your speed, use only low beam headlights, and leave extra following distance between your vehicle and the one in front of you.

area.areaDesc: Inland Southern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Okeechobee
